rows.label: tev001811_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey, Chief! I know how you've been
hobnobbing with the hero, jetting off on
adventures together! NLA's been talking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001811_MSG0020
rows.name:
And I'm MAD, okay?!
I wanna go on crazy adventures too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001811_MSG0050
rows.name:
Aw yeah, you're the best, Chief!
Not that there was any doubt, frankly.
Okay then, let's jet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001811_MSG0080
rows.name:
Augh, Chief!
Come on, don't do this to me![ST:wait ]
